snippet.title: Child hurt in kangaroo attack
snippet.content: A child attacked by a kangaroo in country Victoria has suffered facial injuries. The boy, who is preschool age, came across the kangaroo on a property in the Victorian town of Yering shortly before 8am. Paramedics called to the property treated him for head lacerations and transported him to the Royal Children's Hospital where he was in a stable condition. Originally published as
